properties.areaDesc: Kauai Channel; Oahu Windward Waters; Maalaea Bay; Alenuihaha Channel; Pailolo Channel; Maui County Windward Waters; Kauai Windward Waters; Kaiwi Channel
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 17 at 3:20AM HST until January 19 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu HI
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds increasing to 15 to 25 knots, becoming
northeast tonight. Seas building to 8 to 10 feet today.

* WHERE...Kauai Windward Waters, Kauai Channel, Oahu Windward
Waters, Kaiwi Channel, Maui County Windward Waters, Maalaea
Bay, Pailolo Channel and Alenuihaha Channel.

* WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
A Small Craft Advisory means that wind speeds of 25 to 33 knots
and/or seas 10 feet or greater are expected to produce conditions
hazardous to small craft. Inexperienced mariners, especially
those operating smaller vessels, should avoid navigating in these
conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST SUNDAY
